meaning: An object or group of objects
A system that allows the exchange of energy and matter to and from its surroundings
A system that does not let matter in or out from the surroundings, but does allow energy
Moving objects have energy in this store
Objects lifted through a gravitational field have energy in this store
Objects stretched, squeezed or bent have energy in this store
Magnetic objects interacting have energy in this store
Objects transferring charge have energy in this store
Nuclei undergoing nuclear reactions have energy in this store
Objects undergoing chemical reactions have energy in this store
The hotter the object, the more energy it has in this store
The rate at which energy is transferred or work is done
